drColumn1.title: What is the relationship between lysine and hair loss? Explaining the effects on hair
drColumn1.content: Among those who take lysine supplements as a countermeasure for AGA, some may not know in detail what kind of effects it has. In this article, we will explain the possibilities of 'increasing hair' and 'preventing hair loss' by taking lysine...

drColumn2.title: Explaining hair loss as a sequela of COVID-19 infection
drColumn2.content: COVID-19 can cause symptoms that persist for several months or more after infection, referred to as sequelae (post-infection symptoms). The symptoms of sequelae are diverse, including respiratory symptoms such as shortness of breath, cough, and sputum, and cardiovascular symptoms such as chest pain and palpitations...
